content: bptc round post of next 6 sts be careful to work them in sequential order double_crochet into next st bptc round post of next st double_crochet into next st bptc round post of next st double_crochet into next 5 sts 24 stitches row 8 - 13 repeat row 2-7 row 14 - 17 repeat row 2-5 the following row follow the same pattern as the previous but the edge decreases begin to allow for the neck of the hot water bottle row 18 chain 1 slip_stitch into 2nd double_crochet of previous row chain 3 double_crochet into next 3 sts fptc round post of next st double_crochet into next st fptc round post of next st double_crochet into next st skip 3 sts fptc round post of next 3 sts fptc round post of each of 3 skipped sts working in the same direction across the top of your work ignoring the 3
